title: Gifting Items
body: My friend just re added me to fix the capital in my name and we are not able to do gifting trading because we haven't been added for long enough even though we have been added for at least 2 years. Is there any way that this can be fix or will we have to wait for the week to pass?

replies.body:
Re-added, that means whatever way you're connected to them has been reset, thus meaning you'll have to wait the two week period.

How did you even get the capitalisation wrong in the past, yet be able to use the list as normal for two years?

wait

The friend-list is **not** case sensitive.

**what**
ye kinds sucks so have to wait two weeks to get my gift, i think the caps should be added in automatically.

*But that's what's confusing me.*

The friend's list is *not* case sensitive. As in, Summoner Names are not case sensitive. You can test this out with the "Change summoner name" test tool.

And even amoungst all of this, while he was on your list with that incorrect case, why couldn't you just gift him on that one?
